name: PACT (Featherskull Studios, CrazyCanineStudios, Brutaleon, deadhaggis)
description:
PACT is a retro style survival shooter developed for the GJL Game Parade Spring 2021 with the theme "Strength in Differences".

Variation is the key to survival, as each of your abilities becomes less powerful the more it is used, whilst your others regain their power.

Fire your pistol to damage enemies at range, melee dash to engage in close range or escape, or lob a grenade to inflict radial damage.

Use movement and your abilities to destroy and avoid the Wispskulls lurking throughout the arena and survive for as long as you can.

Controls

Movement: W, A, S, D

Camera: Mouse Movement

Jump: Spacebar

Pistol Shot: Left Mouse Button

Melee Dash: Middle Mouse Button

Toss Bomb: Right Mouse Button

Pause: Escape
